info.description:
NgasihTau is a learning platform API that enables teachers to create Knowledge Pods for sharing learning materials with students.
The platform uses a microservices architecture with Go as the primary backend language.
info.title: NgasihTau API

get.description: Get a paginated list of pending teacher verification requests (admin only)

post.description: Approve a teacher verification request and update user role to teacher (admin only)

400.description: Invalid verification ID or already reviewed

post.description: Reject a teacher verification request with a reason (admin only)

400.description: Invalid verification ID, already reviewed, or missing reason

post.description: Generate quiz questions from material content using AI

get.description: Returns pods recommended based on user's interaction history
Returns trending pods based on popularity
Returns all learning interests selected by the authenticated user

put.description: Sets or replaces all learning interests for the authenticated user. Used during onboarding.

post.description: Adds a predefined or custom interest to the authenticated user's interest list
post.summary: Add a single interest to user's list

delete.description: Removes a specific interest from the authenticated user's interest list
delete.summary: Remove an interest from user's list

post.description: Marks the user's onboarding as complete. User must have selected at least one interest.

get.description: Returns whether the user has completed onboarding and their current interests
Returns a list of all active predefined learning interests that users can select from
Returns predefined learning interests organized by their categories
get.summary: Get predefined interests grouped by category

get.description: Returns pods similar to the specified pod

post.description: Records user interaction for recommendation algorithm
post.summary: Track user interaction with a pod

post.description: Records time spent viewing a pod for recommendations
post.summary: Track time spent on a pod

get.description: Returns user's content preferences based on interaction history

post.description: Disable 2FA by verifying current TOTP code
Generate TOTP secret and QR code for 2FA setup
Verify TOTP code or backup code to complete login for 2FA-enabled accounts

401.description: Invalid code or expired temp token

post.description: Complete 2FA setup by verifying a TOTP code from authenticator app
Authenticate user using Google OAuth authorization code

parameters.description: Google OAuth code and redirect URI
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request body or OAuth error

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password. Returns JWT tokens or 2FA challenge.
Invalidate the refresh token to logout the user
Send password reset email to the user (always returns success to prevent email enumeration)
Reset user's password using the reset token
Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access token and refresh token
Create a new user account with email and password

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Send a new verification email to the authenticated user
Verify user's email address using the verification token

get.description: Get a paginated list of bookmarked materials
Get a list of all bookmark folders

post.description: Submit thumbs up/down feedback for an AI response

put.description: Update a comment. Only the comment author can update.

delete.description: Soft-delete a comment. Only the comment author can delete.

get.description: Get a paginated activity feed from followed pods and users

post.description: Confirm a file upload and create a material record
Generate a presigned URL for direct file upload to storage

400.description: Invalid request or unsupported file type

get.description: Get a material by ID

put.description: Update a material's title and description

post.description: Add a material to bookmarks with optional folder
Send a message to AI with material context using RAG
Export chat history for a material to PDF or Markdown format

get.description: Get paginated chat history for a material
Get AI-generated suggested questions based on material content
Get a paginated list of comments for a material

post.description: Add a comment to a material. Supports threaded replies.

get.description: Generate a presigned URL for downloading a material
Generate a presigned URL for previewing a material
Get ratings for a material. Use summary=true for rating summary.

post.description: Rate a material (1-5 stars) with optional review. Updates existing rating if already rated.

get.description: Get all versions of a material

post.description: Upload a new version of an existing material
Restore a material to a specific previous version

get.description: Get a paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user
Get notification preferences for the authenticated user

put.description: Update notification preferences for the authenticated user
Mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user
Mark a single notification as read

get.description: Get a paginated list of Knowledge Pods with optional filters

post.description: Create a new Knowledge Pod. Only verified users (teachers) can create pods.

403.description: Only verified users can create pods

get.description: Get a Knowledge Pod by its URL-friendly slug. Private pods require authentication and access.
get.summary: Get a Knowledge Pod by slug

get.description: Get a Knowledge Pod by ID. Private pods require authentication and access.

put.description: Update a Knowledge Pod. Requires owner or admin collaborator access.

delete.description: Delete a Knowledge Pod. Only the owner can delete a pod.

get.description: Get a paginated list of activities for a pod

post.description: Send a message to AI with context from all materials in a pod

get.description: Get a list of collaborators for a pod

post.description: Invite a user to collaborate on a pod. Requires owner or admin access.

put.description: Verify a collaborator or update their role. Requires owner or admin access.

delete.description: Remove a collaborator from a pod. Requires owner or admin access.

post.description: Add a downvote to a pod as a negative trust indicator. Each user can only downvote a pod once.

delete.description: Remove your downvote from a pod
delete.summary: Remove downvote from a Knowledge Pod

404.description: Pod not found or not downvoted

post.description: Follow a pod to receive notifications about new materials
Create a copy of a Knowledge Pod. Only verified users can fork pods.
Share a knowledge pod with a student. Only teachers can share pods.
post.summary: Share a pod with a student

409.description: Pod already shared with this student

post.description: Add a pod to your starred list

delete.description: Remove a pod from your starred list

404.description: Pod not found or not starred

post.description: Request permission to upload materials to another teacher's pod. Only teachers can make this request.
post.summary: Request upload permission to a pod

403.description: Only teachers can request upload permission

post.description: Add an upvote to a pod as a trust indicator. Each user can only upvote a pod once.

delete.description: Remove your upvote from a pod
delete.summary: Remove upvote from a Knowledge Pod

404.description: Pod not found or not upvoted

delete.description: Clear the authenticated user's search history

parameters.description: Sort by (relevance, upvotes, trust_score, recent, popular)
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Get materials ranked by all-time engagement
Search using natural language with vector similarity
Get autocomplete suggestions based on query prefix

get.description: Get a paginated list of pods downvoted by the current user
Get a paginated list of pods that have been shared with the current user by teachers
